description: On an avarturine background of reddish copper, a pattern of a tree with blossoms is found on each side and top; a landscape with three pine trees, a hill and a river on each end; the pattern in metallic lacquer varying in color from black to pale yellow; six legs; crest of Hondo family, three asarum leaves grouped as in an ace of clubs within a circle, appears twice on top, the crest of the Hondo family.
medium: Wood, lacquer, mountings of chased and gilded bronze
title: Chest of a Daimyo
